__e: Bill watches a superhero quietly melt a monster's face.
Don't you feel a little different since you've been in the quiet zone?
And I thought, what better time. To come and visit my favorite family? Yay.
It was midnight and the city was as silent as a cemetery.
What's this quiet little girl's name?
I was told, that Ryunosuke-dono's Silent Form, is a powerful technique. Nonsense!
